name: Dr. Rajesh Kumar
title: Chief Veterinary Officer
bio: Dr. Rajesh Kumar is a highly skilled veterinary surgeon with over 15 years of experience. He specializes in soft tissue and orthopedic surgeries and has performed thousands of successful procedures. His compassionate approach and technical expertise make him a favorite among pet owners.
education: Bachelor of Veterinary Science - Madras Veterinary College

name: Dr. Priya Sharma
title: Senior Veterinarian
bio: Dr. Priya Sharma specializes in internal medicine and cardiology. She has a special interest in diagnosing and managing complex medical cases. Her gentle demeanor and thorough approach help anxious pets feel at ease during examinations.
education: Bachelor of Veterinary Science - Kerala Veterinary College

name: Dr. Arun Mehta
title: Veterinary Specialist
bio: Dr. Arun Mehta is passionate about helping pets regain mobility and live pain-free lives. His expertise in orthopedic surgery and rehabilitation has helped countless pets recover from injuries and chronic conditions.
education: Bachelor of Veterinary Science - Bombay Veterinary College
Post Graduate Diploma in Veterinary Orthopedics

name: Dr. Kavitha Reddy
title: Veterinary Dermatologist
bio: Dr. Kavitha Reddy specializes in diagnosing and treating skin conditions in pets. From allergies to autoimmune diseases, she helps pets find relief from uncomfortable skin problems. Her systematic approach ensures accurate diagnosis and effective treatment.

name: Dr. Vikram Singh
title: Emergency & Critical Care Specialist
bio: Dr. Vikram Singh thrives in high-pressure situations. His quick thinking and extensive emergency medicine training have saved countless lives. He leads our 24/7 emergency response team with dedication and skill.
education: Bachelor of Veterinary Science - Rajasthan Veterinary College
Certification in Emergency and Critical Care

name: Dr. Meera Patel
title: Exotic Animal Specialist
qualifications: BVSc, Certification in Exotic Animal Medicine
bio: Dr. Meera Patel has a unique passion for exotic pets. From parrots to iguanas, she provides specialized care for birds, reptiles, and small mammals. Her extensive knowledge and gentle handling make her the go-to vet for exotic pet owners.
education: Bachelor of Veterinary Science - Anand Veterinary College

name: Dr. Suresh Nair
title: Veterinary Dentist
bio: Dr. Suresh Nair believes that good dental health is fundamental to overall pet wellness. His expertise in veterinary dentistry helps pets maintain healthy teeth and gums, preventing serious health issues.
education: Bachelor of Veterinary Science - Bangalore Veterinary College

name: Dr. Anjali Gupta
title: Veterinary Ophthalmologist
bio: Dr. Anjali Gupta specializes in diagnosing and treating eye conditions in pets. Her precision and care in handling delicate eye surgeries have restored vision to many pets. She's dedicated to preserving and improving pet eye health.
education: Bachelor of Veterinary Science - Ludhiana Veterinary College
